instructions: When iPhone detects the edges of the rectangular object, a yellow box frames the object; tap the yellow box to see the dimensions. To take a photo of your measurement, tap the Take Picture button .

Align the dot at the center of the screen with the point where you want to start measuring, then tap the Add button . Slowly pan iPhone to the end point, then tap the Add button to see the measured length. To take a photo of your measurement, tap the Take Picture button . Take another measurement, or tap Clear to start over.
